description: Destination Canada (DC) is Canada’s national tourism marketing organization. As a Crown corporation owned by the Government of Canada, Destination Canada leads the Canadian tourism industry in positioning Canada as a destination of choice for global travellers... See original document for details.
full_summary:
#### Solicitation Notice: Media Monitoring Services
#### Reference Number: CB-7175-14684365
#### Solicitation Number: DC-2023-AK-02
As per the provision of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Government of Canada invites bids from eligible suppliers for the provision of Media Monitoring Services. Bienvenue! Please do read carefully as following is a polite but to the point crawler captured, about... actually its a Text mud-dle 


## Tender Details 
*   Tender Title: Media Monitoring Services
*   Reference Number: CB-7175-14684365
*   Solicitation Number: DC-2023-AK-02
*   Tender Status: Expired

## Background Information 
Destination Canada is a Crown Corporation owned by the Government of Canada responsible for promoting Canada as a four-seasons tourist destination globally.

## Scope of the Project
This Solicitation Notice invites bids for Media Monitoring Services from the Contractor to support Destination Canada’s headquarter office in Vancouver, and in the United Kingdom. The Contractor is responsible for monitoring print, social and digital media in Destination Canada’s key markets, reporting, and providing measurement services.

## Tender Conditions 
*   The service level standards and performance requirements that the Successful Bidder must meet are specified in the RFP documentation.
*   The successful Bidder will be required to provide a comprehensive media monitoring service that will measure, report, and analyze print, social, and digital media, including news articles, blog posts, and other relevant content, in our core markets.

## Tender Deadline and Submission Information 
Submissions are now closed.

## Contact Details 
For any questions or queries, please do not hesitate to contact us via Procurement Director - Annie Kao, at procurement@destinationcanada.com or by phone at  604.638.8336. Please ensure that your submissions are delivered via the ``www.canadabuys.ca`` portal.
